description: Develop, test, and maintain software applications using Python/Java, work with REST APIs, SQL databases, Git, and collaborate with teams.
Analyze datasets using SQL and Excel, create dashboards with Power BI/Tableau, apply statistics, and communicate insights.
Monitor security events, analyze logs, perform vulnerability assessments, respond to incidents, and document risks.
Build machine learning models with Python, preprocess data, evaluate models, and deploy ML services.
